config.name: connectionIdleTimeout
config.description: The timeout that triggers the load balancer terminates both server/client side connection if no data is transferred, in seconds. [Default] 60s

config.name: healthyThreshold
config.description: The number of consecutive health checks successes required before moving the instance to the Healthy state. [Default] 2

config.name: healthCheckTarget
config.description: The instance being checked. The protocol is either TCP, HTTP, HTTPS, or SSL. The range of valid ports is one (1) through 65535. [Default] TCP:default

config.name: healthCheckTimeout
config.description: The amount of time, in seconds, during which no response means a failed health check.

config.name: healthCheckInterval
config.description: The approximate interval, in seconds, between health checks of an individual instance.

config.name: unhealthyThreshold
config.description: The number of consecutive health check failures required before moving the instance to the Unhealthy state.

config.name: maxConnection
config.description: The number of max concurrent connections.

config.name: balancerAlgorithm
config.description: The number of max concurrent connections. Options are roundrobin, leastconn and source
